item.description:
Namaste has a $10 lunch buffet Monday through Saturday. I've only tried Indian food a few times, so I thought this would be a good way to try different kinds for a good price. Bonus for me because it's right down the road. Let's get some lunch! Try and bring cash for your share so we don't have to figure out lots of separate checks, etc.

 

Just want to make sure everyone knows I have this cross-posted with my other group. So a better chance of meeting more people! http://www.meetup.com/Wine-and-Dine-Social-Group/events/73333672/

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: Indian Food Buffet - Namaste India in Southington Saturday Aug 11
